pageContext.claim: “And because of immunity -- [Schiff] has House immunity -- because of immunity, he can't be prosecuted. He -- he took a statement and totally made it up. It was a lie.”
pageContext.analysis: Members of Congress are only exempt from arrest - with the exceptions of treason, felony and breach of the peace - while Congress in session. Still, lying isn't illegal and Congressional immunity is irrelevant to Trump’s claim.
